input.sentences: our neighbor showed us around last week .
her brother was a nut but he loved nice cars .
they had really high priced equipment on board .
i did n't know they needed a team to drive the car .
output.sentences: My neighbor, who's a nice guy, does volunteer work every other weekend.
His wife is adventurous and enjoys mountain climbing and hiking.
Their son is a bit of a nut, when it comes to organization, technology and machines, which made the military rather a good fit for him.
This is from a video of him on board a military vessel, posing by some state of the art equipment, caption reading, "priced well above my head!"
He works with a team to drive a military vessel, which he says is nothing like driving a car.
